Classification: Script of the text #Maturity of script (if the script classification is Brahmi and derivatives only) #Language of the text #Script of the text

Languages: and

  1. Predominantly in Maturity of script (if the script classification is Brahmi and derivatives only), script and
  2. Secondary language is painted, script and
  3. Third language is Known or estimated total number of lines in this text, script and
